trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a field across application domain and process boundaries.
An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract> represents a field of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.

To access one or more fields of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
Returns information about the field that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> identifies.

The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData> structure includes an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that specifies the type of the field.

A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData"></xref> that provides information about the field that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
Returns the value of the field that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the field.
A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the field value.
Sets the value of the field that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> represents.
The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the field.
A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the field value.
The locale ID that the field will use for any locale-specific type conversions.
